import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Calendar, MapPin, Star, Users, Wifi, Car, Coffee, Waves } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const CebuResortBooking = () => { const [checkIn, setCheckIn] = useState('');
